casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. PUREVAL
v.
ELECTIONS COMM. 2018-1523 Supreme Court of Ohio. October 24, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MISCELLANEOUS ORDERS

Sua sponte, appellee ordered to file a response to appellants' emergency motion for an alternative writ setting an expedited response schedule, motion to stay proceedings in Ohio Elections Commission case No. 2018G-022 and/or motion for an injunction pending a final decision no later than 12:00 p.m. on Friday, October 26, 2018.
